name: thrombolytic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or using a drug that breaks up a thrombus (= a thick mass of blood that forms in a blood vessel and may block the flow of blood in the vessel): The cardiologist may decide to administer a thrombolytic agent. Thrombolytic drugs are given to dissolve the clot. The benefit of thrombolytic therapy has to be weighed against the risk of bleeding complications. Thrombolytic treatment should be started immediately. Synonym
clot-busting
More examplesFewer examplesThrombolytic agents are most beneficial when administered promptly.The research suggested treating stroke patients with thrombolytic drugs even after three hours.

a drug that is used to break up a thrombus (= a thick mass of blood that forms in a blood vessel and may block the flow of blood in the vessel): There are circumstances in which the inappropriate administration of a thrombolytic would be disastrous. The damage could have been limited if she had received a thrombolytic. Synonym
clot-buster
More examplesFewer examplesStreptokinase is a first-generation thrombolytic.Do not give a thrombolytic to a patient with unstable angina.He was started on the thrombolytic Streptokinase but did not improve.
